subject: Investing
title: Global Crypto Regulation Landscape
description: A 60-second lesson on Global Crypto Regulation Landscape.

hook.text: El Salvador made Bitcoin legal tender. China banned all crypto trading. Same technology, opposite conclusions.

buildup.text: Crypto regulation ranges from full embrace to outright prohibition depending on the country.

discovery.text: The EU's MiCA framework created comprehensive crypto rules. The US still regulates by enforcement.

twist.text: Regulatory clarity can boost crypto prices by inviting institutional money that fears legal uncertainty.

climax.text: Investors should understand their local rules on custody, taxation, and reporting before buying any crypto.

punchline.text: Regulation is coming everywhere. The only question is how‚Äînot whether.
